ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11406 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.2"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11638)/@code="67660-1" EMS Dispatch Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10556)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Dispatch Section" (CONF:10558)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10991)
Conforms to Emergency Medical Dispatch Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.73:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10993)
Conforms to Dispatch Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.74:2022-01-01)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11638)/@code="67660-1" EMS Dispatch Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10556)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title="EMS Dispatch Section" (CONF:10558)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10991)
Conforms to Emergency Medical Dispatch Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.73:2022-01-01)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:10993)
Conforms to Dispatch Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.74:2022-01-01)

body.codeblock: <section> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.2" extension="2022-01-01"/> <code code="67660-1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="EMS Dispatch Narrative NEMSIS"/> <title/> <text/> </section>
